desc: A small, independent shop in Malmö, Sweden, importing and selling the best of British food, drinks, cards and gifts, and run by two ‘home grown’ British ladies. Simply put, we provide our international family with all their favourites from Britain.

layout.text: A small, independent shop in Malmö importing and selling the best of British food, drinks, cards and gifts, and run by two ‘home grown’ British ladies.
